attributes.additional_details:
The olympics hasn't started yet and my journey to work is already adversely effected by re phasing of triffic lights.
I appeal to the Prime Minister to re instate the pre olympic traffic light phasing so that Londoners, many of whom have already suffered greatly as a result of the imposition of the olympic games are saved from more stress due to unnessesary delays caused by re phasing of the traffic lights

rejection.details: This is a matter for the Mayor and Greater London Assembly.
